item.title: Python and R: When Worlds Collide
item.description: Python and R are two types of incredibly useful programming languages. Both can be used as calculators and can communicate with one another using the reticulate function. My experience in my Biostatistics class has predisposed me to prefering R to python, however, I can clearly see the merit of both languages. I have attached below an R and python chunk to demonstrate the calculation abilities of each. 2+2 ## [1] 4 2+2 ## 4
